attributes.action: Stop Covid-19 vaccinations becoming compulsory for care workers
attributes.additional_details: Everyone has a human right to choose if they want the jab or not making it compulsory takes away that human right. The MCA act says that we are all allowed to make our own decisions even if it may be an unwise decision as long as we’re all informed which we all are we have that right to decide for ourselves. stop forcing people to do things they chose not to do. This is going to increase the unemployment rate in turn costing the government/people more money in benefits
attributes.background: Stop the proposed plan to make COVID-19 jabs compulsory for anyone working within the care setting /health care industry
